item.title: Android - Best Apps for WiFi - refreshed for 2011
item.description: I’ve been writing about Android for some time now and Best Android Apps for Wifi is a very popular post.Â So here is a refreshingly new look for 2011 at some of the best wi-fi apps for your smartphone. Auto Wifi Enabler This was a fav app for a month - til I realised I only ever needed 2 wifi hotspots - the one at work and the one at home.
